thread.title: John P
thread.title_full: Power Meter City reviewed by John P

author: John P
title: John P
text: I was having trouble deciding on which Power Meter would work best for my personal needs. I got all the information i needed to make a educated decision from Power Meter City. I couldn't be happier with my products, price, and service. I would definitely recommend them to family and friends. Thanks again for your time and expertise.
